docs.title: PowerShell SysAdmin Scripts
docs.text:
Welcome 👋

This repo contains production-ready PowerShell scripts and a reusable module (SysAdminTools) for common sysadmin tasks.

docs.title: Quick links
docs.text:
• Scripts: see /scripts
  • Module: see /modules/SysAdminTools
  • Help: generated with PlatyPS into /docs/help

docs.title: Typical workflow
docs.text:
1. Write or update a function in modules/SysAdminTools/Public/
  2. Run tests + lint
  3. Regenerate docs
./build.ps1 -Task Docs

docs.title: Safety conventions
docs.text:
• Destructive actions should support -WhatIf / -Confirm
  • No secrets in code or logs
  • Prefer structured output (objects)

docs.title: Build docs (PlatyPS)
docs.text:
./build.ps1 -Task Docs

This generates: - Markdown help under docs/help/SysAdminTools - Compiled help XML under docs/help/SysAdminTools/en-US

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
This section documents exported commands in the SysAdminTools module.

Docs are generated via PlatyPS and copied into this site during the docs build step.

docs.title: -ProgressAction
docs.text:
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}

Type: ActionPreference
Parameter Sets: (All)
Aliases: proga

Required: False
Position: Named
Default value: None
Accept pipeline input: False
Accept wildcard characters: False

docs.title: CommonParameters
docs.text: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable. For more information, see about_CommonParameters.

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text: Follow standards. Run lint and tests before PR.
